title: Version 2.3.21 Release
description: Latest update released on January 2, 2026, continuing improvements to the AI code editor with bug fixes and performance enhancements.

title: Version 2.3: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements
description: Holiday release focused entirely on bug fixes and stability improvements including core agent, layout controls, code diff viewing. Features four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) with customizable switching. Includes Enterprise insights, billing groups, service accounts, and improved security controls.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor IDE does not update to version 2.3 - Users report that when clicking 'Check for updates,' the system says there are no new updates even though version 2.3 exists
Some users reported that their IDE is still stuck on version 2.2.44 even after the 2.3 release

title: Usage Limit Changes and User Frustration
description: Users reported hitting unexpected usage limits in early January 2026, with complaints about surprise limits despite holiday promotions doubling usage. GitHub issues and Reddit discussions show developer frustration.

community_feedback.quote: Claude devs complain about surprise usage limits - software developers using Claude Code have been sounding alarms about changes to usage limits over the past few days
Instantly hitting usage limits with Max subscription - User reports hitting limits after just 2 hours of continuous use
New Claude Code Limits are BRUTAL! User reported hitting an alert about running out of usage with less than six hours remaining

title: 2026 Pro Tips and Workflows Guide
description: New guide published in January 2026 covering effective Claude CLI usage, referencing a December 2025 Claude CLI incident and providing updated workflows for the new year.

title: Wave 13: Merry Shipmas - Multi-Agent Sessions & SWE-1.5
description: Wave 13 introduces first-class support for parallel, multi-agent sessions, Git worktrees support, side-by-side Cascade panes, and SWE-1.5 model as new default. SWE-1.5 Free is available for all users for 3 months with frontier-level coding performance.

community_feedback.quote: SWE-1.5 is super fast, crazy fast - dramatically quicker than alternatives, achieving 950 tokens per second
Users appreciate the solid free tier and Pro pricing around $15/month with 'basically unlimited' SWE-1.5 use
SWE-1.5 model doing non-requested/not-relevant changes in multi-file tasks

title: Gemini 3 Flash Integration
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available for all users, combining Gemini 3 Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency. Achieves 78% on SWE-bench Verified benchmark with 3x faster performance than Gemini 3 Pro.

community_feedback.quote: Gemini 3 Flash is now available in Windsurf!

title: December 2025 Roundup and Early Updates
description: Early December Copilot updates across Spaces, Visual Studio, and model options. Includes new Copilot Spaces sharing features and public preview access to OpenAI models. Community discussion posted in late December 2025.

title: v3 API Updates - December 2025
description: Official API release notes from December 1, 2025, featuring v3 API Updates including 'Notes and Playbooks routers' and other API improvements for the AI software engineer.

title: Version 0.22.0 - Gemini 3 Free and Conductor Extension
description: Major update released in mid-December 2025 featuring Gemini 3 series models opened to free users, Conductor extension integration, and Endor Labs partnership. Enhanced capabilities for free tier users.

title: Version 0.22.4 - Bug Fixes and Improvements
description: Late December 2025 update with bug fixes and improvements, part of the regular weekly release cycle (Tuesdays at UTC 2000).
